description: Calculates the ratio between concealed or externalized energy costs and declared energy efficiency metrics, exposing systems that appear sustainable while displacing hidden energetic debt.

signal_inputs.E_declared: Energy reported in official efficiency or sustainability metrics (kWh, GJ, or equivalent)
signal_inputs.E_externalized: Estimated energy embodied in mining, manufacturing, logistics, and end-of-life stages
signal_inputs.E_concealed: Energy from hidden labor, maintenance, and unrecorded ecological impacts

high.interpretation: High hidden energy load; systemic misrepresentation likely

critical.interpretation: Predatory or extractive system disguised as efficient

outputs.bias_signal: Qualitative summary indicating probable data capture origin
